root.name: Super Motherload
root.description: OverviewSuper Motherload is a 1 to 4 player retro future action puzzle adventure developed by XGen Studios. Set in an alternate reality, where Cold War era powers have set their eyes on Mars as a way to feed their constant need for more resources, the player controls an independent contractor hired to do the actual Martian mining. The game features both a fully voiced campaign mode by comics writer Kurtis Wiebe, and 150 level puzzle mode.It is due out on PS3, PC and Mac in 2013, with an enhanced PS4 release following later that year. The PC and Mac releases were successfully Greenlit on Steam on 29 June 2013.
